title: Ordinary Days Of Taking Shelter From the Rain With A Gatekeeper Girl - Novel Updates
author: Sushi Thunder   寿司サンダー
description:
Two people who can't be 'normal' find a place to shelter from the rain in their youth.

Aoki, a former delinquent who has no place at home or in the classroom, meets a senpai one year higher, Amamori. The two, unable to fit in with the world, spend some time together in front of the closed rooftop, and come to understand each other.>
